display_long_description:
Become a PianoVisionary with the world's premiere VR Music Teacher. PianoVision accelerates your piano learning using Mixed Reality and hand tracking. Connect a MIDI keyboard or play on a flat surface with the Virtual Piano!

Experience the next evolution of piano learning in mixed reality with our biggest update yet! This update brings an entirely reimagined interface and introduces PianoVision Plus, a premiere PianoVision experience with >10,000 songs and exciting mixed reality features.

🎵 What's New:
- Access 10,000+ popular songs from The Beatles, Disney, John Legend, Ed Sheeran & more
- Curated Mixed Reality environments to bring your home to life
- Meet Ludwig, your personal AI piano teacher
- Automated fingering suggestions
- Enhanced sheet music support
- Sheet music generation for MIDI imports
- Enhanced virtual keyboard with more precise hand tracking

PianoVision Basic Features
- 1000+ public domain songs and exercises
- MIDI and Virtual pianos
- Import custom songs
- Custom sectioning and fingerings

Whether you're a complete beginner or an experienced pianist, PianoVision's mixed reality technology transforms your learning journey into an immersive, engaging experience. Watch as notes fall to your keys, receive real-time feedback, and master your favorite songs faster than ever before.
Start your piano journey today.

Note: Quest hand tracking is still new. With the Virtual Piano, stick to the 100 songs at Level 0.

Contact zac@pianovision.app or join the Discord if you have issues.
